name: Sharpest Dungeon
description:
Sharpest Dungeon will be a roguelike dungeon crawler with adult content. Fight, seduce or dominate your way through every level. Your playstyle will decide which abilities you can choose and your behavior in the story. You can download the demo right there.

This is the first build and the game is in an early state, so expect a few bugs and missing content.

There are currently 4 sex scenes to explore, but with the help from Iron-Blade, we will get the rest done soon and polish the old ones.

If you like what you see, you should consider becoming a patron, join my discord and give me some feedback. I'm always open for some new ideas or suggestions.

This game was inspired by Carpetwurms work on Thirstchasm, so if you like my work, you should check out his too.

If you like it, you can also support me on 

Patreon What is Planned?

• At least 6 biomes with 3 lvl's each
• hundreds of hand-made rooms, also different boss rooms
• 3 difficulties with different story and sex animations
• Companion's that help or distract you
• 2 or more sex animations for every character
• Sex based game mechanics and abilities
• A funny story that changes with your play style
• Different main characters with unique abilities

An action packed erotic dungeon crawler. And with your support we can dig deeper and deeper into the Sharpest Dungeon.
